channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report X-2023090974
item.description:
Report X-2023090974

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: FLETCHER
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found in trailer ripped and wet placed in a plastic tub and moved to the QA staging location. DescribePack: package was repacked in other station content was place in a plastic bag. Content leaked and damage box. new box had no hazmat label on it and the label for the first box was taped to the new one. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Moved from the QA staging location to the hazmat Cage for processing.

  • Description: 1. X-2023090941 SequenceEvent: damaged during unloading DescribePack: upon inspection we found the box to leaking and the cap was off the bottle which was causing the leakage. package unsuitable for delivery. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: applied spill fix 2. X-2023090957 SequenceEvent: DAMAGED DURING UNLOADING DescribePack: HYDROCHLORIC ACID/ ACETONE DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: APPLIED SPILL FIX TO SECURE THE SAFTEY OF OTHERS

item.title: Report X-2023090922
item.description:
Report X-2023090922

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE BUCKET WAS BROUGHT TO QA1 BECAUSE THE LID WAS CRUSHED AND THERE WERE SOME PACKETS OF THIS DISHWASHER CLEANER THAT HAD BEEN PUNCTURED AND SPILLED OUT. IT WAS 5 OF THE 100 TABLETS THAT WERE DAMAGED AND LEAKED OUT INTO THE BUCKET. DescribePack: 5 SOLID DISHWASHER TABLETS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WE MADE SURE TO ISOLATE THIS BUCKET IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND PUT IT IN THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023090888
item.description:
Report X-2023090888

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials tote and taken to the hazardous materials staging area away from personnel and other packages. DescribePack: Upon inspection it was noted that three of the plastic jugs were cracked near the top causing the contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials drum awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023090660
item.description:
Report X-2023090660

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T15:12:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-09
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO US BY THE IC BELT MANAGER. HE NOTICED IT IN A LINED TOTE BUT THE PACKAGE HAD SOME WETNESS. WE DISCOVERED THAT 2 OF THESE PLASTIC BOTTLES/CANS HAD LEAKED OUT INTO THE ENTIRE PACKAGE WHICH CONTAMINATED EVERYTHING IN THE BOX. DescribePack: 2 LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: MADE SURE TO GET THE LINED TOTE TO THE HAZMAT CAGE AND UNDER THE HOOD VENT
